uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.model

Class MZTabColumnFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.model.MZTabColumnFactory

  • public class MZTabColumnFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a static factory class which used to generate a couple of MZTabColumn objects, and organized them "logicalPosition, MZTabColumn" pair. Currently, mzTab table including three kinds of columns:
    1. Stable column with stable order: header name, data type, logical position and order are stable in these columns. All of them have been defined in ProteinColumn, PeptideColumn, PSMColumn and SmallMoleculeColumn.
    2. Optional column with stable order: column name, data type and order have defined in the ProteinColumn, PeptideColumn, PSMColumn and SmallMoleculeColumn. But header name, logical position dynamically depend on IndexedElement. These optional column generated by addOptionalColumn(MZTabColumn, MsRun) method.
    3. Optional columns which put the end of table-based section. There are three types of optional column: AbundanceColumn, OptionColumn and CVParamOptionColumn, which always be added at the end of table. These optional columns have not stable column name, data type or order. In this factory, we use addAbundanceOptionalColumn(Assay) to generate AbundanceColumn; use addOptionalColumn(String, Class) to create OptionColumn; and use addOptionalColumn(Assay, CVParam, Class) to create CVParamOptionColumn.
    User: Qingwei Date: 23/05/13

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MZTabColumnFactory getInstance(Section section)
        Based on section to generate stable columns, and store them into stableColumnMapping and columnMapping which maintain all columns in the factory.
        Parameters:
        section - SHOULD be Section.Protein_Header, Section.Peptide_Header Section.PSM_Header or Section.Small_Molecule_Header.

      • getSection

        public Section getSection()
        Get the table-based section. Section.Protein_Header, Section.Peptide_Header Section.PSM_Header or Section.Small_Molecule_Header

      • getStableColumnMapping

        public java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,MZTabColumn> getStableColumnMapping()
        Get stable columns mapping. Key is logical position, and value is MZTabColumn object. Stable column with stable order: header name, data type, logical position and order are stable in these columns. All of them have been defined in ProteinColumn, PeptideColumn, PSMColumn and SmallMoleculeColumn.

      • getAbundanceColumnMapping

        public java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,MZTabColumn> getAbundanceColumnMapping()
        Get all abundance columns. Key is logical position, and value is MZTabColumn object. Abundance Columns always stay in the end of the table-based section.
        See Also:
        AbundanceColumn

      • getOptionalColumnMapping

        public java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,MZTabColumn> getOptionalColumnMapping()
        Get all optional columns, including option column with stable order and name, abundance columns, optional columns and cv param optional columns. Key is logical position, and value is MZTabColumn object.
        See Also:
        AbundanceColumn, OptionColumn, CVParamOptionColumn

      • getColumnMapping

        public java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,MZTabColumn> getColumnMapping()
        Get all columns in the factory. In this class, we maintain the following constraint at any time: columnMapping.size == optionalColumnMapping.size + stableColumnMapping.size

      • addOptionalColumn

        public void addOptionalColumn(MZTabColumn column,
                     MsRun msRun)
        Add a optional column which has stable order and name, into optionalColumnMapping and columnMapping.
        Parameters:
        column - SHOULD NOT set null.
        msRun - SHOULD NOT set null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException: - If user would like to add duplicate optional columns.
        See Also:
        MZTabColumn.createOptionalColumn(Section, MZTabColumn, IndexedElement)

      • addGoTermsOptionalColumn

        Add ProteinColumn.GO_TERMS into optionalColumnMapping and columnMapping. Notice: this function only used in Section.Protein_Header

        columnType - SHOULD NOT empty.

      • addAbundanceOptionalColumn

        public java.lang.String addAbundanceOptionalColumn(Assay assay)
        Add AbundanceColumn into AbundanceColumn, optionalColumnMapping and columnMapping. The header like: {Section}_abundance_assay[1]
        Parameters:
        assay - SHOULD NOT empty.
        See Also:
        AbundanceColumn.createOptionalColumn(Section, Assay, int)

      • addAbundanceOptionalColumn

        public java.lang.String addAbundanceOptionalColumn(StudyVariable studyVariable)
        Add three AbundanceColumn into AbundanceColumn, optionalColumnMapping and columnMapping at one time. The header like: {Section}_abundance_study_variable[1], {Section}_abundance_stdev_study_variable[1], {Section}_abundance_std_error_study_variable[1].
        Parameters:
        studyVariable - SHOULD NOT empty.
        See Also:
        AbundanceColumn.createOptionalColumns(Section, StudyVariable, String)

      • getHeaderList

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Print a header line, each item split by 'TAB' character. [PRH|PEH|PSH|SMH] header1 header2 ...
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • getOffsetColumnsMap

        public java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Integer,MZTabColumn> getOffsetColumnsMap()
        The offset record the position of MZTabColumn in header line. For example, protein header line, the relationships between Logical Position, MZTabColumn, offset and order are like following structure: Logical Position MZTabColumn offset order "01" accession 1 01 "02" description 2 02 ...... "08" best_search_engine_score 8 08 "091" search_engine_score_ms_run[1] 9 09 "092" search_engine_score_ms_run[2] 10 09 "10" reliability 11 10 "111" num_psms_ms_run[1] 12 11 "112" num_psms_ms_run[2] 13 11

      • isOptionalColumn

        public boolean isOptionalColumn(java.lang.String header)
        Judge the column is optional or not, based one its header name.
        Parameters:
        header - SHOULD NOT be null!

      • findColumnByHeader

        public MZTabColumn findColumnByHeader(java.lang.String header)
        Query the MZTabColumn in factory, based on column header with case-insensitive. Notice: for optional columns, header name maybe flexible. For example, num_psms_ms_run[1]. At this time, user SHOULD BE provide the full header name to query MZTabColumn. If just provide num_psms_ms_run, return null.

      • findColumnByPosition

        public MZTabColumn findColumnByPosition(java.lang.String logicalPosition)
        Query the MZTabColumn in factory, based on column logical position.

      • findAllColumnsByOrder

        public java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,MZTabColumn> findAllColumnsByOrder(java.lang.String order)
        Query all the MZTabColumn which have the same order in factory.
